subject: Re: Fwd: Missing Stores on Website

full_threads.body: Logged a total of 20mins to Harvest
@joel done with tasks 1 to 3. Can you please help me with task #4? Thank you!

‌

Hi Rika,

Looking good! If the client didn't sent phone numbers, where did you find them?

A couple of tweaks please:

1. Woden Valley - ph. Add brackets to area code for consistency.

2. Bendigo - ph. Replace '61' in mobile number with '0' to read: 0430513105

3. Armstrong - ph. Replace '61' with '0' to read: 0422301837

4. Page alignment - is there a way we can get the elements to line up on the locations page? Screenshot attached.

Regards,



Chris Paradowkski
Partnerships Manager
Mobile: 0421 859 547
Phone: 1300 072 134
‌
Wolf IQ
Level 2, 383 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000
wolfiq.com.au

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
‌
Hi Team,

Can you please assist with the below request from Big Barber?

Please add the following new locations to the website. Copy and paste from original request below.

Pleas note, I will discuss the Google Page location with customer.

-//-


1. Woden Valley
I am getting the info from this page - https://www.westfield.com.au/woden/browse-stores and creating the Google Page
Ground floor store missing.

2. Werribee
I am getting the info from this page - https://pacificwerribee.qicre.com/Shop/Stores/Big%20Barber#/location/{42DFB3EA-4068-4130-A1F5-B533EA85F110} and creating the Google Page

3. Bendigo
I am getting the info from this page - https://bendigomarketplace.com.au/stores/big-barber/ and https://bendigomarketplace.com.au/contact/ and creating the Google Page

4. Armstong
Can get info from - https://www.home-co.com.au/centre/armstrongcreek/

Shop T23, HomeCo Armstrong Creek Town Centre, 458-498 Torquay Rd, Armstrong Creek VIC 3217

Ph: 0422 301 837


-//-

Regards,
Chris Paradowski
Partnerships Manager
Mobile: 0421 859 547
Phone: 1300 072 134
‌
Wolf IQ
Level 2, 383 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000
wolfiq.com.au
